strip_phrases: Opens in a new window or tab

promo.description: An item's promotional offer(s), typically a discount or digital content that comes with a purchase.

subtitle.description: An item's subtitle, containing some additional details about it.

stock_count.description: The amount of items in stock.

secondary_stock_count.description: A secondary stock count, typically shows how many 'open box' items are available at this store for the listing.

purchase_restriction.description: Restrictions on purchase, typically shows whether it's available for in-store purchase only or if there's a limit on how many a customer can purchase.
